des:
With the Ale Switch skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your smart switch devices by voice. To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button in the Alexa App to link your Ale Smart Home account and discover your devices. 
When using the skill, you need established names for your devices. You can use the Ale Smart Home App to set up the device name,Once you know the name for your devices, you can say the following:
"Alexa, turn on smile"
"Alexa, turn off smile"



How to use “Ale Smart Home” Mobile App
1、Install “Ale Smart Home” from App Store
2、Register your account and login 
3、Click the “+” symbol
4、Choose the device model
5、Setup the device wifi 
6、Change the device name
7、then , you can control your device by mobile Application

If you have any questions, please visit the iFutureLife app manual "http://www.huihetech.cn/iFutureLife_smart_plug_en.pdf"
